page.title: 07My typical schoolday
page.content: My name is Jonathan.I am eight years old.I live over the post office in Wootton.In the morning I am woken up at half past seven by the television.When I get out of bed I go to have my breakfast in the dining room.Usually I have toast for breakfast.After breakfast I have to get dressed.I wear a jumper,a shirt and a pair of trousers.After getting dressed I go and wash my face and clean my teeth.Then I go to brush my hair and go to school.When I get to school I go into the playground.When I get into the playground I wait for my best friend James.When we get into the school I'm ready to go into assembly.After assembly I get to work until half past ten when we go for playtime.I have nine freinds at school.After playtime I can read.
